Comment: Abilities: A052 (Soul Drain), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: The hero drains the life and mana of an enemy unit instantly and adds it to his own. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 80 hit points and 40 mana drained. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 160 hit points and 60 mana drained. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 240 hit points and 80 mana drained. |n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - 320 hit points and 100 mana drained.
